posts.post_content:
Hello I have an Old Judge Conway for sale. The card is trimmed but has a great image. Price is 90 dollars which includes shipping. Scans can be seen in my FS/FT folder in my signature line.
                                   Thanks,
                                     Steve
Edit . . . no need to tell me, I just took a look and it is Dick Conway w/ Boston.  Nice photo quality, but I'm looking for a different Conway.
